channel.title: Tutorial island xml
channel.description:
Hey i thought i would just slowely release my xml edits for tutorial island since it is so boring to do. It is only upto financial adviser atm most of stuff is added if you have not done it this hopefully should save you some time ill keep adding it as a progress through edits
This is where you can dl tutorial island landscape: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,428451.0.html
http://www.mediafire.com/?mhzqnyonwrn
Or use this
[code]<NPCLoc> <id>476</id> <startX>216</startX> <startY>746</startY> <minX>214</minX> <maxX>217</maxX> <minY>746</minY> <maxY>748</maxY> </NPCLoc> <NPCLoc> <id>499</id> <startX>223</startX> <startY>740</startY> <minX>219</minX> <maxX>225</maxX> <minY>737</minY> <maxY>742</maxY> </NPCLoc> <NPCLoc> <id>499</id> <startX>224</startX> <startY>738</startY> <minX>219</minX> <maxX>225</maxX> <minY>737</minY> <maxY>742</maxY> </NPCLoc> <NPCLoc> <id>499</id> <startX>223</startX> <startY>741</startY> <minX>219</minX> <maxX>225</maxX> <minY>737</minY> <maxY>742</maxY> </NPCLoc> <NPCLoc> <id>474</id> <startX>228</startX> <startY>733</startY> <minX>227</minX> <maxX>232</maxX> <minY>731</minY> <maxY>736</maxY> </NPCLoc> <NPCLoc> <id>47</id> <startX>231</startX> <startY>733</startY> <minX>227</minX> <maxX>232</maxX> <minY>731</minY> <maxY>736</maxY> </NPCLoc> <NPCLoc> <id>47</id> <startX>230</startX> <startY>732</startY> <minX>227</minX> <maxX>232</maxX> <minY>731</minY> <maxY>736</maxY> </NPCLoc> <NPCLoc> <id>474</id> <startX>231</startX> <startY>735</startY> <minX>227</minX> <maxX>232</maxX> <minY>731</minY> <maxY>736</maxY> </NPCLoc> <NPCLoc> <id>478</id> <startX>216</startX> <startY>726</startY> <minX>212</minX> <maxX>219</maxX> <minY>725</minY> <maxY>731</maxY> </NPCLoc> <NPCLoc> <id>478</id> <startX>214</startX> <startY>727</startY> <minX>212</minX> <maxX>219</maxX> <minY>725</minY> <maxY>731</maxY> </NPCLoc> <NPCLoc> <id>480</id> <startX>208</startX> <startY>733</startY> <minX>206</minX> <maxX>211</maxX> <minY>727</minY> <maxY>734</maxY> </NPCLoc> <NPCLoc> <id>480</id> <startX>209</startX> <startY>729</startY> <minX>206</minX> <maxX>211</maxX> <minY>727</minY> <maxY>734</maxY> </NPCLoc>[/code]
[code]<GameObjectLoc> <id>56</id> <x>217</x> <y>748</y> <direction>2</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>9</id> <x>214</x> <y>728</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>25</id> <x>206</x> <y>734</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>25</id> <x>211</x> <y>734</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>23</id> <x>208</x> <y>734</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1189</id> <x>216</x> <y>731</y> <direction>2</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>25</id> <x>206</x> <y>727</y> <direction>4</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>25</id> <x>211</x> <y>727</y> <direction>4</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>23</id> <x>208</x> <y>727</y> <direction>4</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc>[/code]
I know this is all simple stuff but it is all very time consuming and boring lol.

item.title: Tutorial island xml
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

RSCShadow:

Yes yong, that’s just like how quests work :). I was planning on drawing the percentage client-sided too.

Of course, and it wont be hard to add a progression percentage to the client.

item.title: Tutorial island xml
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Good job pompio. Simple stuff, but it will prove useful.

Here is something quick to check the tutorial island progress in an INT. Every time you have completed one section of the tutorial, add a new INT, and add checks for the players progression status to determine if they can continue with the tutorial or not…

In your Player class, add:

	/**
	 * Tutorial Island Progression
	 *	@author Yong Min
	 */
	public int progress = 0;
	
	public void setTutorialIslandProgress(int progress) {
		this.progress = progress;
	}
	
	public int getTutorialIslandProgress() {
		return progress;
	}

Still in Player class, add:

progress = Integer.parseInt(props.getProperty("progress"));

And:

pr.setProperty("progress", "" + this.getTutorialIslandProgress());

Now in your Template, add:

progress=0

Now every time you talk to a new NPC on tutorial island, make it increase the INT.

player.setTutorialIslandProgress(player.getTutorialIslandProgress() + 1);

Or:

player.setTutorialIslandProgress(1);

And to make a check on the current progress:

if(player.getTutorialIslandProgress() == 1) {

I will write up tutorial NPCs when I get some spare time.

Read full topic
